name: Team CBLT
description:
Disclaimer – This is not endorsed by Rooster Teeth in any way. Views, opinions, thoughts are all my own. Rooster Teeth and RWBY are trade names or registered trademarks of Rooster Teeth Productions, LLC. © Rooster Teeth Productions, LLC. This is a freely distributed fan-game. If you are being charged by anyone anywhere to play CBLT or JPDE, you’re being scammed.

Hello there, and thank you for showing interest in my fanmade RWBY Visual Novel, titled Team CBLT.

This is a completely free Visual Novel I’m coding, writing, scripting and editing, based on the RWBY animated series. It’s a story set during the timeline of Volume 1 through to Volume 3, developed in Ren’Py and runs on Windows, Linux and Android Phones. Depending on how many and which bonds you will have made during your semester at Beacon Academy, you may influence the ending of the storyline and even canon events from the show. I invite you to support the original release by Rooster Teeth.

Team CBLT is also a mod for Meinos Kaen’s own VN, Project JPDE, and uses many of the resources he has collected for his game. I’ve just commissioned some resources of my own, and put a whole new story in place of the old one Meinos is writing. I also invite you to check out his work, and I’ll post some links as to where you can follow its development.
